items.title: Digital Worksheets
items.summary: Give your little ones a headstart to Tamil language with this amazing digital bundle "Ula varum Uyir ezhuthukkal". This…
items.content_html:
Give your little ones a headstart to Tamil language with this amazing digital bundle "Ula varum Uyir ezhuthukkal". This is a perfect way to introduce the world's oldest language "Tamil".

Sheets included in this bundle are:

i. Uyir ezhuthukkal Poster 

ii.Visual discrimination 

iii.Scissoring skills

iv.Dabbing/ Colouring

v.First letter recognition

All the activities are based on the first 12 Uyir ezhuthukkal.

 

 How can you use this? 

You can use these in n number of ways! One method I can share for using it repeatedly is to laminate them.

  1. Download these worksheets.
  2. Print them
  3. Laminate them (for repeated usage)
  4. Buy velcro (use for cutting and pasting activities)

 Kindly note these are digital bundle and NO physical products will be shipped.

 Check our Instamojo stores to buy !

Buy worksheets now

items.title: TAMIL FLASHCARD SET
items.summary: Thank you for your overwhelming response!! We have RESTOCKED!! This Flashcard set contains a total of 52 cards which…
items.content_html:
Thank you for your overwhelming response!!

We have RESTOCKED!!

This Flashcard set contains a total of 52 cards which includes

  • Uyir ezhuthukkal
  • Mei ezhuthukkal 
  • UyirMei ezhuthukkal (First series)

SHIPPING ONLY ON THURSDAYS. 

Printed in 300 GSM matte paper.

Card size: 9 * 13 cms

Update on shipment:

Shipping will be done once in two weeks owing to the outbreak of COIVD-19.

WE ALSO DO INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING on REQUEST! 

You can write to tamiltoddlers@gmail.com if you're looking to buy Tamil Flashcards outside India. :) 

We have served to customers from Singapore and Norway ! 

To purchase our Flashcards , please pay through below link:
